source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_00<tab>By now, Thancred can tell when his friends are up to something.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_00<tab>Танкред в замешательстве. У каждого из его друзей явно какие-то свои мысли.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_01<tab>Thancred suspects Urianger is keeping secrets again, and while there is no doubt your enigmatic comrade would only do so with the best of intentions, the weary bard cannot help but worry. He asks you to follow Urianger while he and Y'shtola continue to learn what they can of the Final Days.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_01<tab>Thancred suspects Urianger is keeping secrets again, and while there is no doubt your enigmatic comrade would only do so with the best of intentions, the weary bard cannot help but worry. He asks you to follow Urianger while he and Y'shtola continue to learn what they can of the Final Days.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_02<tab>You reach the aetheryte in the central plaza of Bestways Burrow, and spy Urianger heading out to Mare Lamentorum. What could possibly demand his attention outside?
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_02<tab>You reach the aetheryte in the central plaza of Bestways Burrow, and spy Urianger heading out to Mare Lamentorum. What could possibly demand his attention outside?

source:
TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_03<tab>Stepping out from the entrance to Bestways Burrow, you see Urianger making his ascent up and out to Mare Lamentorum. It would be a simple task to catch up with him, but it would perhaps be wiser to follow at a distance and see where he is heading.

※You must follow Urianger to complete this task. Return to the designated location should you become separated.
target:
TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_03<tab>Stepping out from the entrance to Bestways Burrow, you see Urianger making his ascent up and out to Mare Lamentorum. It would be a simple task to catch up with him, but it would perhaps be wiser to follow at a distance and see where he is heading.

※You must follow Urianger to complete this task. Return to the designated location should you become separated.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_04<tab>Urianger comes to an abrupt stop, and it becomes clear he has been aware of your presence for some time. The two of you have a candid conversation about Urianger's many regrets, and his aversion to keeping secrets from you and the other Scions moving forward. He then thanks you for this rare opportunity to speak so openly.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_04<tab>Urianger comes to an abrupt stop, and it becomes clear he has been aware of your presence for some time. The two of you have a candid conversation about Urianger's many regrets, and his aversion to keeping secrets from you and the other Scions moving forward. He then thanks you for this rare opportunity to speak so openly.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_05<tab>Urianger has a plan to help facilitate more forthright cooperation with the Loporrits, but he will need your help to see it through.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SEQ_05<tab>Urianger has a plan to help facilitate more forthright cooperation with the Loporrits, but he will need your help to see it through.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_TODO_00<tab>Search for Urianger at the designated location.
TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_TODO_01<tab>Search for Urianger again at the designated location.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_TODO_01<tab>Снова поищите Урианже в указанной зоне.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>The Final Days will make brave fools of us all.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_000<tab>Последние Дни превратят нас всех в отчаянных идиотов.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Did Urianger seem strange to you? More so than usual, I mean.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_010<tab>Урианже не показался тебе странным? В смысле, больше, чем обычно?

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_011<tab>I know he has a penchant for keeping his own counsel, but I'd be lying if I said I wasn't worried. Would you go and see if he's all right?
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_011<tab>Знаю, он бывает довольно замкнутым, но я совру, если скажу, что не переживаю за него. Возможно, стоит проверить, в порядке ли он?

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_012<tab>Y'shtola and I will remain here and see what else we can learn about the Final Days. If you hurry, perhaps you can catch up to him.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_012<tab>Мы с Я'штолой останемся здесь, попытаемся разузнать ещё что-нибудь о Последних Днях. Если поторопишься, ещё успеешь его нагнать.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Better for only one of us to go, in case it's a delicate matter.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_THANCRED_000_020<tab>Лучше пойти только одному из нас — на случай, если это окажется личным делом.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>Urianger usually puts more effort into concealing his clandestine endeavors. Or perhaps he's simply given up on trying to hide it, knowing we'll find out eventually.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_025<tab>Обыкновенно у него лучше получается маскировать свои странные дела. А может, он просто больше не пытается? Зная, что в конечном итоге мы всё равно узнаем?..

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_026<tab>In any case, that he acts with good intentions is plain. So please, give him the benefit of the doubt.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_YSHTOLA_000_026<tab>В любом случае уверена, что он действует из лучших побуждений. Прошу, если удастся, поговори с ним об этом.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Urianger appears to be heading towards the entrance to Bestways Burrow...
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Похоже, Урианже направляется к выходу из Заячьей Норы...

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Urianger ventures off into Mare Lamentorum for reasons unknown. You must tread carefully, else he might sense your presence...
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Урианже направляется наружу, в Море Скорби, по неизвестной причине. Теперь постарайтесь, чтобы он вас не заметил...

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Follow Urianger from a safe distance. The objective will end in failure if you are noticed, or if you fall too far behind.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Следуйте за Урианже, оставаясь на безопасном расстоянии. Миссия будет провалена, если вас обнаружат, или если вы слишком отстанете.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Should you fail to complete the objective, you may try again by returning to the designated location.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>Если вы потерпите неудачу в миссии, сможете начать её заново, вернувшись в изначальную точку.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_050<tab>In truth, my reason for traveling hither was to effect a plan of mine own. A plan which may pave a way forward for us all.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_050<tab>В сущности моё намерение сюда отправиться было моей собственной придумкою. План, коий призван проложить путь другим.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_051<tab>"May,“ I say, for there is no guarantee of success. 'Tis the reason I set out alone...that failure, should it come, would be mine to bear alone.
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_051<tab>Хорошо бы, однако гарантий нет. Вот причина, по коей я отправился в одиночку... ибо неудача, если таковая меня настигнет, станет моею и только моею.

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_052<tab>Yet thou standest before me with proffered hand and open heart...
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_052<tab>Однако ж ты стоишь предо мною, протягивая руку, и с открытым сердцем...

source: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_053<tab>'Twould be remiss of me to refuse thy amity, and so I ask─wouldst thou join in mine endeavor?
target: TEXT_AKTKMC107_04405_URIANGER_000_053<tab>С моей стороны было бы глупо отвергнуть твою доброту, а потому спрошу — присоединишься ли ко мне в моём начинании?
